titleStmt.title: A new declaration of the citizens of London to the Lord General Monck in Scotland sent post to His Excellency, by order from the Common Council : with His Excellencies answer and further resolution brought post on Saturday last to the city, and proposals to the people touching the Parliament and nation.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
